review: I ordered two of these gadgets, they both were easy to set up and use...  for the first two months, then they started freezing and losing WiFi connection, and even with soft and hard resets it still has trouble maintaining a connection for the length of a movie. I also own two Roku streaming devices, and they don't have any issue connecting to the network.
